SEARCH
Package edu.carroll.cs389application.service

Class ImageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
edu.carroll.cs389application.service.ImageServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageService
@Service public class ImageServiceImpl extends Object implements ImageService
Implementation of ImageService interface for saving to DB,uploading,validating and user images.

    static enum 
    ImageServiceImpl.ErrorCode
    This enum represents the possible error codes that may occur during the validation of an image file.

  • Method Details

    • saveImage

      public void saveImage(ImageForm imageForm, Login user)
      Change this to boolean This method will take an image and strip it of all the image metadata, and then save the data in our DB. At the end of the method we have it call the saveImageFile command which will write the image to disk under the given location.
      Specified by:
      saveImage in interface ImageService
      Parameters:
      imageForm - Data from the Image Page including the image file.
      user - User that the image will be saved and linked too.

    • pullImages

      public List<org.springframework.data.util.Pair<InputStream,String>> pullImages(Login user)
      This method will use the user login information to access the database and return the images in a "Pair" data structure imported from the data.util.Pair. In the Pair we have the input stream of the file resource and the string conversion of the file content-type.
      Specified by:
      pullImages in interface ImageService
      Parameters:
      user - Instance of the user currently logged into the app
      Returns:
      Pair data structure on the left being the input stream of the file and on the right being the Content-type of the resource

    • validateFile

      public ImageServiceImpl.ErrorCode validateFile(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      This method will validate any type of multipart file and return a ErrorCode for either being null, non-existent, too large, and improper content-type. Unless the file is valid in which case the method will return a ErrorCode for a valid file.
      Specified by:
      validateFile in interface ImageService
      Parameters:
      file - Instance of file to validate against errors
      Returns:
      This will the type of ErrorCode to throw or don't throw at the user.

    • loadUserImagesbyUserID

      public List<UserImage> loadUserImagesbyUserID(Login user)
      Returns a list of UserImage objects for a given user.
      Specified by:
      loadUserImagesbyUserID in interface ImageService
      Parameters:
      user - User whose images should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of UserImage objects associated with the given user

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
